# Immune_cells_analysis

# The input data files are stored @ https://github.com/donghaixiong/Immune_cells_analysis
# or @ https://gitlab.com/donghaixiong/immune.cells.big.datafiles/-/blob/master/ImmuneCells23clusters.rds

# Fig. 1a and 1b were generated by R codes in the file "Fig1a_b_codes.R"

# Fig. 1c was generated by R codes in the file "Fig1c_codes.R"

# Fig. 2 was generated by R codes in the file "Fig2_codes.R"

# Fig. 3 was generated by R codes in the file "Fig3_Tgd_B_analysis.R"

# Fig. 4 was generated by R codes in the file "Fig4_signature_analysis.R"

# Fig. 5 and its related FigS12 was generated by R codes in the file "Fig5_FigS12_codes.R"
